website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting waterproof lighter that is easy to use and fits conveniently in your pocket.
pros: Delivers a flame that burns at over 600°F
Includes a built-in O-ring that keeps fuel from evaporating
Stainless steel construction ensures the lighter is built to last
An economical lighter for camping and other outdoor activities
cons: Usually requires multiple strikes to get the flint to spark

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a solid survival lighter
customer_reviews.text: Update 17AUG2018: Have had one of these in a go bag and the other sitting in my desk drawer. Just pulled them out after 8 months. Both lit first strike! Update 31DEC2018: Filled this 3 months ago and placed it on a shelf to test if it would evaporate like a zippo does, as of today, it was still lighting with a single strike! Not sure they will work in a windy situation, but it seems to be a great emergency fire starting option(one of many I have)! This is so good, I ordered a second one to add to my wife's go bag.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: For anyone who claims it "doesn't work" you either over ...
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who claims it "doesn't work" you either over filled it and got the flint wet so it won't spark until it dries a bit or you need to adjust the wick. Simple fact is when sparks meet flammable liquid soaked wick, it will light. Had to deduct a star because the plating on the inside is degraded. Isn't it supposed to be solid stainless steel? Works as advertised. Buying more for EDC bag, camping ect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backup fire starter.
customer_reviews.text: Great product... I always like to keep backup fire sources everywhere. Fero Rods, magnesium, bic lighters, etc... this might be my favorite yet. It's sealed, so it's waterproof and holds fluid indefinitely. It's small and metal so you can put it anywhere and not have to worry about breaking it. Best of all, it gives you a actual flame, not just a spark... definitely recommend, and will be purchasing more myself.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: to small
customer_reviews.text: Really tiny, about an inch and a half tall. Very little area for fluid. I you take it apart to fill you will loose the o ring. Very cheezy item. Maybe get 6 burns at 10 seconds of burn each. Did not find it to be very useful. You can buy several cheap plastic lighters for the price of this, with 1000 times the fluid and burning.
customer_reviews.author: wanta know

customer_reviews.title: Nice little compact keychain lighter for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Nice little compact keychain lighter for emergencies, camping etc. It's a very simple yet sturdy design - you fill the reservoir with lighter fluid, replace the starter, and go. The lighter case is water tight with a small O-ring as well.
customer_reviews.author: LS1866

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! PRACTICAL! EVERYONE SHOULD OWN ONE!
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter! I bought this for my husband, a Master Plumber, small business owner and non smoker who uses torches for mig/tig welding and soldering on apprpriate pipe and other miscellaneous job related tasks. He has lighters in his truck for his torches but always loses them and has to run out in the middle of a job to a convenience store to buy a pack of lighters. He has only had it for a couple of days but he loves his new "tool". He keeps it on his belt loop. His colleagues all want one now so I'll be buying a back up for my husband and one for the house.
customer_reviews.author: CoBraKai

customer_reviews.title: Really Useful Item
customer_reviews.text: Just a useful item. Nothing really more to say about it. It just goes on your key chain and is ready if you need it. Fire whenever you need it. VEvery camper/backpacker should have one of these no doubt
customer_reviews.author: Jabir BekeleTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Just Get a Zippo
customer_reviews.text: On average, it takes about 20 attempts before the wick lights. This lighter requires the same fuel Zippo lighters require. For the same price you can get a Zippo lighter with lighter fluid and extra flints, and that will light the first time, every time. Seriously, just get a Zippo.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Everstryke's customer service is great. I received an email from Everstryke before my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product. Works perfectly and doesn't use up lighter fluid very quickly. Also, Everstryke's customer service is great. I received an email from Everstryke before my lighter was delivered with instructions on how to fill it, take it apart, use it, etc.,as well as the numbers of some reps to call if you ever have an issue with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your daypack.
customer_reviews.text: Works every time. There's not much more to say about this, it works and it stays filled because of the seal. Fill it up, put it in your daypack and it's ready to use even if it's 6 months later. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Les C

customer_reviews.title: Great little lighter.
customer_reviews.text: Filled it with fluid, and months later, still able to light it. no dry out like with a zippo lighter. Great device. Not windproof, but it is not advertised to be windproof.
customer_reviews.author: Just your average guy

customer_reviews.title: Love this little lighter
customer_reviews.text: Love this little lighter. I bought one, and tried it out and was so impressed that I bought several more. I am on a SAR Team, and spend a bit of time outdoors. This little package provides a nice little lighter, for a that piece of mind. I have one hanging on my pack and another tucked in a small SHTF pack along with some fire starting materials.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Unscrewed!!
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5, but it unscrewed and I just happened to notice it in my floorboard. Now I’m hyper vigilant about making sure it stays screwed. Works great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzmom

customer_reviews.title: Jumpy
customer_reviews.text: The spring popped out while I was out at lunch only to be lost forever in the depths of fast food delight.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little lighter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little lighter. Better quality steel construction than I expected and lights up each time. Ended up buying three to give as gifts. Had a question and emailed Everstryke customer service and got an immediate positive response. Small and fits nicely on keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kirk

customer_reviews.title: New Old stock
customer_reviews.text: Rusted fuel container, dry cracked oring on arrival. Still works fine, just looks 2 years old
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Good lighter
customer_reviews.text: Great seals, keeps the fluid for months. If you know how to use a zippo then you’ll know how to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: The Wick is a problem.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to pull the wick out, as it got shorter and it came completely out of the body and I cannot get it back in. Was also changing colors on the body, which doesn't bother me. But not to able to get the wick back in, makes it useless.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Bottom fluid area doesn't open
customer_reviews.text: All the videos make it look very easy to open, but in reality, my lighter arrived and nothing I've been able to do has opened it. It arrived stuck together.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Works okay.
customer_reviews.text: It works okay for the first couple of months. After that it kind of gets spotty on how well it lights and if it leaks or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great little lighter
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small. Fits great in my pants pocket. It strikes easy and puts out a good little flame. It's easy to fill. I bought it as prepping item so that I will always have the basics on me. I love this lighter and will find a place for it, but for everyday carry I would like to find a lighter that has a more stormproof flame.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Carson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold the fuel
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with Zippo lighter fuel and tightly screwed it. 4 days later it had nothing in it. I don't know if it is the o ring or whatever else, it doesn't hold the fuel for long. Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. If you are in to survival even a little bit, having this on your key chain is a must. Doesn't take a lot of fluid and I just bought it so I am not sure how long the fluid will last, just going to keep a can of fluid in my car and shouldn't have a problem with running out. great little lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Great product. Started a wonderful fire with it while camping this evening. It's incredibly compact, so keeping it on the keychain is not burdensome. I can imagine this item coming in handy in a variety of situations.
customer_reviews.author: roverode

customer_reviews.title: Nice small profile
customer_reviews.text: Nice small profile, clips on my backpack. Easy to fill, easy to use. SO much better than rubbing two sticks together for fire. I also bought the matching lighter fluid container. Little bigger, but thats good.
customer_reviews.author: Zipparado

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak and works well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool little gadget. Doesn't leak and works well UPDATE: I’ve had this on my keychain for years now. It’s never been confiscated by airport security, and even though I’ve probably only used it 5 times or so, It always works when I need it, and I haven’t had to refill it. I highly recommend this lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wilner

customer_reviews.title: Good for back up
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad item to keep in places like your glove box, tackle box, dop kit, etc. Seals well so - fill and forget!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cameron

customer_reviews.title: and I'm quite pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item for an EDC pocket light; when it arrived, the interior was very loose, and the fluid leaked out deteriorating the o-ring. Contacted the seller, and Cathy at Everstryke sent me a new replacement immediately. This one is much tighter, and I'm quite pleased so far. Will give it a week of use to see how it holds up, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: J Bartling

customer_reviews.title: Needed tools to remove inside flint staff to ad fuel.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tiny lighter, one I was able to remove secondary staff. Works great, and is very small and convenient to attach where needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Super cool little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Super cool little gadget. Seems to keep the lighter fluid from evaporating which was my complaint with this kind of lighter. Its TSA friendly so I keep it in my briefcase for emergency cigar lighting.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Keychain Lighter
customer_reviews.text: It's great for a keychain., Be careful when filling it because it can overflow easily and that's not good for the rubber o-ring.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Great thing to have in your backpack or hunting pack ...
customer_reviews.text: These lighters will hold a charge/fueling forever if the cap is secured. Great thing to have in your backpack or hunting pack where you need a go-to fire starter. Highly recommended for its durability and longevity. You folks at higher elevations will especially like it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas JL Merker

customer_reviews.title: Was nice while I had it. Smh
customer_reviews.text: Product was pretty decent I used to for my backup lighter whenever my zippo ran out of fluid. Only problem was it kept unscrewing itself in my pocket. Luckily I could always find it in my pocket...until today. Well, was nice “while I had it”. Wanted to give it 4 stars but now it’s a 1.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent survival lighter!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, very small, survival lighter! I carry it on my keychain all the time, but it could easily be used as a zipper pull as well. Unobtrusive, but always there. Could save your life. Well worth the cost!!!
customer_reviews.author: saxxman747

customer_reviews.title: Cool item to g e t you by.
customer_reviews.text: Neat item, well made, just in case. This is one of those just get it items. Neat to have, perfect for a zipper pull. Contained flame. Done deal !!
customer_reviews.author: johnpoelking, Hemet ca.

customer_reviews.title: ... over a million acres of forest it is a good thing to have in case of an
customer_reviews.text: Being a pilot that flies fire patrol over a million acres of forest it is a good thing to have in case of an emergency
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Grachanin

customer_reviews.title: attach to backback
customer_reviews.text: attached it to my backpack after fueling it up....it doesnt leak...fire in 1 minute when camping..weighs practically nothing..works well
customer_reviews.author: Jefff

customer_reviews.title: It falls apart as you walk
customer_reviews.text: The lighting element unscrews as you walk around and falls off
customer_reviews.author: Austin / Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little lighter is exactly what I wanted. Bought it a few days ago and have waited to write review until I carried it a while. I was concerned it may leak, not a problem. It lives nicely on my key ring. Works great and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold enough fluid.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little lighter, but it holds very little fluid and doesn’t last long at all. Cool to have if you like collecting lighters, but not very useful...
customer_reviews.author: Tangela Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few one in my emergency kit, and one on my key chain. Just add some liquid lighter fluid and your all set.
customer_reviews.author: Brian KTM

customer_reviews.title: ... than i expected but then again it is probably better than way so it can fit on your key ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a bit smaller than i expected but then again it is probably better than way so it can fit on your key chain.
customer_reviews.author: john miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing EDC Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest little lighter. Works better than a Zippo and has the added benefit of possibly saving your life. Lighter is well made and it's a cool talking piece. Had a question about the wick and Everstryke got back to me immediately. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this little lighter again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long, if you understand how to maintain and operate a z1ppo like product you won't be disappointed. Not likely for daily use or survival but I'm not disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency fire starter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the key chain. Nice to know you can make fire anywhere, anytime without carrying matches or a heavy, full sized lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: Super handy! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Filled it with fuel months ago and used it just yesterday to burn the end of some rope! Love having fire handy in such a small package!
customer_reviews.author: hypocrat37

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've switched to lighting BBQ's with this just because it's my new toy. Well made. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellar

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for fire for a bug out bag!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really had a chance to use it yet, but I filled it and tested it, works great. Got one of these as a third alternative to lighting a fire, keep it attached to my bug out backpack.
customer_reviews.author: DisasterChick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good thing to have for survival. Good size, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still testing it to see how it performs while wearing it on my keychain daily. So far it works great and lights with one or two strikes of the flint. The fuel has not dried out. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Norman Aune

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fluid doesn't evaporate and it its a quick start. can't beat it really.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Revilla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for on my key ring in case I forget my lighter
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great little item. Unlike a zippo, the fuel doesn't quickly evaporate so I keep in in my EDC for use at any moment.
customer_reviews.author: Covert Operator

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes quite a few strikes to light but works, can't light in any wind tho.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome EDC capsule lighters!
customer_reviews.text: Her and I are both happy with the quality... Functions well, good fit and finish, totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: if only Tom Hanks was this smart in Cast Away
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have on your key ring for just in case.. if only Tom Hanks was this smart in Cast Away lol
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Fire UGH!
customer_reviews.text: Light Em Up Boys This Is So Cool Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Resistant Lighter
customer_reviews.text: Great for a back up water resistant lighter. Lasts a very long time as a reserve lighter. I keep it with me at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little product for those who don't smoke but want ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little product for those who don't smoke but want to be able to light an 'emergency' fire on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S. White

customer_reviews.title: Great little lighter smaller that a bic
customer_reviews.text: Great little lighter smaller that a bic. Does heat up after extended use but otherwise no problems. Lights easily and stays lit unlike a bic. Got this to light zippo hand warmers and my incense, does just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little lighter. Fits on a key chain without being bulky. It does suck if there is wind though.
customer_reviews.author: The_H_Family

customer_reviews.title: Handy indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with the Zippo Fuel Cannister, this lighter has proven useful and trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact design and IF the rubber seal helps retain ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compact design and IF the rubber seal helps retain the lighter fluid for an extended time frame as stated, then an ideal "extra" fire starter source.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great EDC product I keep it on my key chain
customer_reviews.author: John Langevin

customer_reviews.title: Get a better quality one
customer_reviews.text: It works but it's rusted inside and the cap doesn't thread on properly anymore after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: small and percfect for your key chains. never be with out fire..
customer_reviews.author: jdillabo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this and works great and carry it in the car now in case of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Clement

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Not a zippo, but close. O-ring seals fluid from leaking. Great backup emergency lighter
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ok love this mini zippo lighter So much I'm gonna order a few more to add to some other packs I have
customer_reviews.author: Rainymadman

customer_reviews.title: Great little lighter
customer_reviews.text: I like email communication on how to set up the lighter, easy to use and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I used it two times and it broke. A small piece broke off so it's worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Yokiel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and liked it so much I bought four more for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rakkasan 2/187

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Pro: fluid last a long time in a sealed container clips anywhere Con: it's tiny can be very hard to remove inner sleeve Overall nice if you want a backup lighter with a clip on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized compact lighter does light up I'd like it
customer_reviews.text: Fuel still seems to evaporate, or I didn't fill it up all the way. Nice sized compact lighter does light up I'd like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lighter!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little lighter!!! Very small and built tough! Just follow the directions to add the lighter fluid and it's ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Rafe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Worked right out of the box, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wright

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the product, cheaply made. Dosen’t REMOTELY what the imples
customer_reviews.author: George Chua

customer_reviews.title: Everstryke Match Pro Lighter - Waterproof Fire.
customer_reviews.text: We hung these off our keychains, they are great to have, perfect size work well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan simsTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Survival Life Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lighter. It is small and it doesn't leak. I bought one for myself and one as a gift. I get a great reaction from everyone who sees it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy thing to have on your keychain when you forget or lose your normal lighter
customer_reviews.author: m0n

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: the lighter work but my lighter was full of rust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a slip resistance texture on the outside but a great tool.
customer_reviews.text: I think it should have a slip resistance texture on the outside but a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Just add lighter fluid and this compact light is solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: SojuTX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the coolest outdoor products. Reusable, sustainable, and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: c.bright

customer_reviews.title: Chain latch broke
customer_reviews.text: Great little lighter, filled it up about a month ago and it still lights fine. I am a bit disappointed in the chain, the latch broke after two weeks and fell off my key ring. Luckily it was in my pocket so I didn't lose the lighter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a week because it wouldn’t spark anymore
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Match Pro Lighter is the perfect backup.
customer_reviews.text: Newest addition to my keychain. Match Pro Lighter is the perfect backup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never leave Home Without It!
customer_reviews.text: Great little lighter. Put it on your Keychain and you always have fire. Great looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Rich330

customer_reviews.title: Nice little survival lighter
customer_reviews.text: Nice little survival lighter. I bought 3 so I could gift a couple of them to people. I love it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: OJay

customer_reviews.title: Whenever I write a review I include the pros and ...
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I write a review I include the pros and cons. The problem in this case is there are no pros. Filled it with Zippo and it lit after several strikes but it never lit twice in a row. In fact, it usually took multiple strikes and now it only occasionally lights when struck. This is supposed to be a reliable device but clearly it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Updated- Lasted for about a week
customer_reviews.text: Gave a solid review previously, but this product has stopped working on me. Simply put, it does not work, I strike and there is no fire at all. I just bought it so there is no reason it shouldn't be working. Not too happy with the purchase. On a side note, upon delivery the keychain part arrive broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: A nice little lighter that will work at every spark and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked everytime !! A nice little lighter that will work at every spark and is waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lighter
customer_reviews.text: It's so small you hardly know it's there on the key chain, but it works great. This wouldn't necessarily be an every day type of lighter, but it could be. I got it for emergencies and I'm sure it will do its job when I call on it.
customer_reviews.author: ronworf

customer_reviews.title: this is the peanut lighter i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i deduct one star for the only thing holding the lighter in the casing is the lid which unscrews. works quite well. Lara from Survival Life on Amazon sent me an email with the information necessary for selling a fuel burning item over the internet (this is my opinion and not something Lara stated in the email) and it works as stated on the catalog page.
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: Terribly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased one of these nifty lighters a few months ago to keep on my edc key ring. Used it exactly 3 times and it fell apart when I attempted to refreshen the fluid reservoir. Very disappointing. I tried to contact Everstryke regarding this, but am unable to find any contact info to do so. This is an unfortunate waste of money and you should consider a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Filled with lighter fluid and it still won't light. The flint does spark but this piece is worthless
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: so easy to carry with or attach to a
customer_reviews.text: very simple design, and extremely small, so easy to carry with or attach to a backpack
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Goose

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless.
customer_reviews.text: Description says it's solid stainless. The one that came was poorly plated. Returning for a refund. Descent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: A. Burg

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the wrong thing and really have no use for this lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: It will eat through lighter fluid very quickly if used often like I have been using it
customer_reviews.text: Small and handy. I caught my hand on fire after filling it up and almost burned my apartment down, but not going to judge based on that. It will eat through lighter fluid very quickly if used often like I have been using it. Overall very useful and doesn't make a noticeable difference on the weight of my key ring.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

product_meta.title: Everstryke Match Pro Lighter - Waterproof Fire Starter Especially for Survival and Emergency Use
product_meta.description: This clever tool is an invaluable, possibly life-saving utensil that is equally at home in your wallet, purse, bug-out bag, toolbox, or even the kitchen drawer. The all new design is made out of solid stainless steel, making it even more rough, tough, rugged, and ready for the trail. The improved design holds double the fuel of the original Everstryke match and believe it or not, we’ve managed to make it even more simple to use! Grab one today to make sure that no matter where you are, you're never more than an arm's length away from a fire source. Note: Lighter fluid is not included...you must add your own.
feature_bullets: The all new Everstryke Pro has been completely redesigned, with new features like a replaceable flint, the wick last 10x longer and is even replaceable!
Contains the flint and wick in one all-inclusive fire starting kit that fits conveniently in your pocket.
Strikes hot, burns hot: Flame burns at over 600 degrees fahrenheit
Long Lasting: Each match is capable of 15,000 long burning strikes. Built in O-Ring keeps fuel from evaporating indefinitely
Easy to use: If you can strike a match you can start a fire (and this one won't burn your fingertips). NOTE: Lighter fluid is not included...you must add your own.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
